Subject: EPP Client Creates Outbound Firewall On Endpoints.
Description:
Hi,

Recently we noticed that EPP agent creates an Outbound Block QUIC rule in the local Windows FW on the endpoint. Apparently this has been a thing forever and went unnoticed.

Can you please confirm why EPP needs to create local Firewall rule? and If not necessary can we disable this process?

I am attaching the document with screenshot showinf that the EPP agent created local firewall on the host.

Thanks,
Parin
What_We_Know__c:
the customer needs to know if we have a block rule for the QUIC protocol. As far as the documentation is concerned I only found a bug fix for Brave browser that indicates that there is one for Chrome and Edge.
I will seek confirmation from engineering.
Next_Steps__c: waiting for an answer in the Teams group and tomorrow I am opening an R&D ticket for the question if I have no answer.
